definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
sassy young woman or pretty girl (esp. one from China's spice belt: Guizhou, Hunan, Jiangxi, Sichuan and Yunnan)

sentences.english: Have we not some relatives in those parts, my dear sister?
sentences.chinese: ‘親愛的妹子，我們有些親戚住在那裏嗎？’

sentences.english: No doubt the younger sister of the one who had come to his room.
sentences.chinese: 這想必是剛纔來他屋裏那個姑娘的妹子。

sentences.english: Now Jesus loved Martha, and her sister, and Lazarus.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌素來愛馬大，和他妹子，並拉撒路。

sentences.english: Besides his sister, Mademoiselle Baptistine, he had two brothers.
sentences.chinese: 除了他的妹子巴狄斯丁姑娘以外，他還有兩個親兄弟。

sentences.english: Try to have a quick conversation with non-intimidating girl
sentences.chinese: 嘗試跟一位面善的妹子展開一段簡短的對話。

sentences.english: It was that brat of a sister of mine who was so stupid.
sentences.chinese: 是我那寶貝妹子乾的好事。

sentences.english: also Basemath daughter of Ishmael and sister of Nebaioth.
sentences.chinese: 又娶了以實瑪利的女兒，尼拜約的妹子巴實抹。

sentences.english: The earlier items on this list don't even involve women you're interested in.
sentences.chinese: 一開始的那些項目，甚至都不涉及你所感興趣的妹子。

sentences.english: And Amnon said unto him, I love Tamar, my brother Absalom's sister.
sentences.chinese: 暗嫩回答說，我愛我兄弟押沙龍的妹子他瑪。

sentences.english: You gain the ability to potentially meet girls anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 你會獲得隨時隨地與妹子們勾搭的能力。

sentences.english: And Heber begat Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their sister.
sentences.chinese: 希別生雅弗勒，朔默，何坦，和他們的妹子書雅。

sentences.english: Makir took a wife from among the Huppites and Shuppites. His sister's name was Maacah.
sentences.chinese: 瑪吉娶的妻是戶品，書品的妹子，名叫瑪迦。

sentences.english: How fair is thy love, my sister, my spouse!
sentences.chinese: 我妹子，我新婦，你的愛情何其美。

sentences.english: Jesus loved Martha and her sister and Lazarus.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌素來愛馬大，和她妹子，並拉撒路。

sentences.english: A parlance shows the nine girls are the sister of Shala.
sentences.chinese: 一說九個姑娘是沙拉的妹子。
